p: Generally, the authors have reported full studies of processes from laboratory to pilot scale and not the other way around [ 5]. Filly et al. [ 6] have proposed a green method for the extraction of essential oil from aromatic herbs without any added solvent or water. This technique, solvent-free microwave extraction (SFME) is a combination of microwave heating and dry distillation. Experiments performed in a 75 L pilot microwave reactor prove the feasibility of SFME upscaling and potential industrial applications.
